title: Categorization Rules
subtitle: Manage how transactions are automatically categorized

learnedRules.title: Learned Rules
learnedRules.description: Rules learned from your manual categorizations
learnedRules.noRulesDescription: When you categorize transactions, the patterns will appear here.

ruleTypeTooltips.payee_default: Matches any transaction with this payee name
ruleTypeTooltips.iban_default: Matches transactions with this payee AND IBAN
ruleTypeTooltips.iban_only_default: Matches any transaction with this IBAN (no payee required)

learnedRules.hierarchyInfo: More specific rules (with IBAN) take priority over general payee-only rules.
learnedRules.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this learned rule? This action cannot be undone.
learnedRules.bulkDeleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected rules? This action cannot be undone.

customRules.title: Custom Rules
customRules.noRulesDescription: Create rules to automatically categorize transactions based on patterns.

form.name: Rule Name
form.modePatternHelp: Match transactions by text in description, counterparty name, etc.
form.modeIbanHelp: Match transactions by exact counterparty IBAN and optional Variable Symbol.
form.ibanPatternHelp: Enter full IBAN, partial IBAN, or bank code (e.g., /0800 for Česká spořitelna).
form.priorityHelp: Higher priority rules are checked first (1-100)
form.stopProcessingHelp: If enabled, no other rules will be checked after this rule matches

customRules.systemRuleTooltip: System rules cannot be edited or deleted
customRules.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this custom rule? This action cannot be undone.
